name: Gato Mia Roguelike - Touch - With visuals!
name_original: Gato Mia Roguelike - Touch - With visuals!
description:
Toutch controls: Swipe in the desired direction to take a step.
Touch screen once to call for directions, or for the cat!
In pc, use spacebar to call and directional keys to move.
Or click and drag, release to take a step.

This is the same game as Gato Mia Roguelike with only two demo levels but just with a few changes (just a few):

  • Accessible touch controller!
  • Better sound positioning,
  • Icons
  • Demo mode only so far... only two leves. Easy and hard!
  • Come back later or just have some fun!
    Almost the same game
  • The won't answer always now but itś more random now.
  • Removed the second cat glitch (you could hear two cats sometimes at the old version.)
  • improved subtitles timing.
  • and added some icons and made a visual system for the thing. you can play with your eyes closed if you can hear well with both ears.
  • have added some animation to it also.
